app.title: Child Health Records
app.subtitle: Progressive Web Application for child health data collection

child.recent_illnesses_placeholder: Describe any recent illnesses or health concerns (optional)
child.consent_text: I hereby provide consent for the collection and processing of my child's health data for the purpose of health monitoring and care. I understand that this data will be used to improve child health outcomes and will be handled securely.
child.na_selected_helper: N/A selected - other options are disabled
child.malnutrition_helper: Select 'N/A' if no signs are visible, or choose specific symptoms

form.title: Child Health Data Collection
form.subtitle: Complete all sections to register a new child health record
form.working_offline: You're working offline. Data will be stored locally.
form.login_required: Log in with internet connection to enable location tracking and data upload.
form.age_invalid: Age must be between 0 and 216 months (18 years)
form.weight_invalid: Weight must be a valid positive number
form.height_invalid: Height must be a valid positive number
form.phone_invalid: Please enter a valid 10-digit phone number
form.validation_failed: Please fix the validation errors before proceeding
form.date_birth_future: Date of birth cannot be in the future
form.date_birth_too_old: Child must be 18 years or younger
form.age_range_invalid: Child must be between 0 and 18 years old

help.title: Help & Support
help.subtitle: Find answers to common questions and get help using the Child Health PWA
help.how_register_child: How do I register a new child?
help.register_child_answer: Navigate to the Form tab, fill in all required information including child's name, age, weight, height, and guardian details. Don't forget to provide parental consent before submitting.
help.health_id_answer: A Health ID is a unique identifier generated for each child. It helps track health records over time and can be auto-generated or manually entered.
help.need_internet: Do I need internet to use the app?
help.internet_answer: No! The app works completely offline. Data is stored locally and synced when internet becomes available.
help.authentication_answer: Use your assigned username and password to login. The app supports secure login with encrypted data storage.
help.data_secure_answer: Yes! All sensitive data is encrypted before storage. Data only leaves your device when you explicitly sync it to the server.
help.forgot_credentials: What if I forget my login credentials?
help.forgot_credentials_answer: Contact your system administrator or use the password reset feature if available.
help.offline_works_answer: The app automatically saves all data locally when offline. When internet returns, you can sync all pending records to the server.
help.how_much_storage: How much data can I store offline?
help.storage_capacity_answer: The app can store thousands of records offline, depending on your device's storage capacity. Check Settings > Storage for current usage.
help.clear_browser_data: What happens if I clear my browser data?
help.clear_data_answer: All offline data will be lost. Make sure to sync your data regularly when online to prevent data loss.
help.how_sync_data: How do I sync my data?
help.sync_data_answer: Go to the Sync tab and tap 'Sync All Records'. You can also sync individual records. Syncing requires an internet connection.
help.sync_fails_answer: Failed records remain in the queue and can be retried. Check your internet connection and try again. Contact support if problems persist.
help.sync_frequency_answer: Sync regularly, preferably daily or whenever you have stable internet connection. This ensures data backup and reduces storage usage.
help.camera_access_issue: Why can't I access the camera?
help.camera_access_answer: Ensure you've granted camera permissions to the app. You can also upload photos from your gallery if camera access isn't available.
help.photos_secure_answer: Yes, photos are compressed and encrypted before storage. They're only uploaded when you sync the record.
help.photos_without_internet: Can I take photos without internet?
help.photos_offline_answer: Absolutely! All photos are stored locally and will be synced when internet becomes available.
help.app_slow: The app is slow or not responding
help.app_slow_answer: Try refreshing the page or clearing the app cache in Settings. If problems persist, check your device's available storage.
help.lost_data_answer: Check if the data was synced by going to the Records tab. Unsynced data might be in the Sync tab queue. Contact support for data recovery assistance.
help.report_bug: How do I report a bug?
help.report_bug_answer: Use the support contact information below to report bugs. Include details about what you were doing when the issue occurred.
help.tip_auto_save: Use auto-save to prevent data loss while filling forms
help.tip_clear_photos: Take clear, well-lit photos for better record quality
help.tip_sync_regularly: Sync regularly to keep your data backed up
help.tip_check_storage: Check the storage usage in Settings to manage space
help.tip_enable_notifications: Enable notifications to know when sync is complete
help.photo_capture_desc: Take photos using camera or upload from gallery. Photos are automatically compressed and secured.
help.offline_storage_desc: All data is stored locally and encrypted. Works completely offline with automatic sync when online.
help.smart_sync_desc: Intelligent synchronization with retry logic and progress tracking. Sync individual records or all at once.
help.security_desc: Simple authentication, data encryption, and local storage ensure your data is always protected.
help.install_pwa_info: Install this PWA on your device for the best experience!
help.android_instructions:
1. Tap the menu (three dots) in your browser
2. Select 'Add to Home Screen' or 'Install App'
3. Follow the prompts to install
help.ios_instructions:
1. Tap the Share button (square with arrow)
2. Scroll down and tap 'Add to Home Screen'
3. Tap 'Add' to install
help.language_change_info: The app supports multiple languages. Change language in Settings > Appearance.
help.contact_support_info: Need more help? Our support team is here to assist you.

offline.sync_pending: Data will sync when connection is restored

validation.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.phone_invalid: Please enter a valid phone number
